revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = D-Link DVA-G3342SD.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = HorstBox WLAN Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = D-Link_DVA-G3342SD |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = D-Link |model = DVA-G3342 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = SD |revision = A1? |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = G54 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, dsl modem, analog phone gateway |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = RRK2004110167-1 |icid = 4216A-WMPG09 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Infineon (Lantiq);PSB 50505;AMAZON-ME (PSB 50505 E V1.3); |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 4KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 235 <!-- 235 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = SK hynix;HY57V281620ETP-H; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Infineon;ADM6996M; |dsl_ports = |voip_ports = |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:17:9A |oui = 00:17:9A
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = Linux;2.4.20-AMAZON-3.2-M416-V30;;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCI,USB 2.0 |exp_minipci_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = ADSL2+ |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bg
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = dlink |defaultssid_regex = ^dlink$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Alpha Networks |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 07/2007 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Alpha Networks WMP-G09 |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR2413; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== This device is the '''HorstBox''' Standard.
[http://www.ip-phone-forum.de/showthread.php?t=142794&s=215971d02610b1e874d2263aded3d1d0 Forum post w/ internal shots and boot log] :Stock firmware is Linux (MIPS Linux-2.4.20-AMAZON-3.2-M41) ::<small>Linux version 2.4.20-AMAZON-3.2-M416-V30 (hr@hrx1) (gcc version 3.3.4) #2 Thu Apr 26 11:12:51 CEST 2007</small> :Presumed 8MB Flash :'''[[NEC]]''' D72010 USB 2.0 controller :00:17:9A OUIs, '''dlink''' SSID (presumed default)
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.produktinfo.conrad.com/datenblaetter/900000-924999/923438-an-01-en-D_LINK_HORSTBOX.pdf DVA-G3342SD manual]
